de.dfki.adom.ssdp

Class SSDP

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dfki.adom.ssdp.SSDP

  • public class SSDP
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for the SSDP communication of an ADOM.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String OMM_NAMESPACE
      The namespace of the OMM: "urn:adome:rest:ver:1".
      static java.lang.String OMM_UUID
      The Universally Unique Identifier of the OMM: "76203660-ebd9-11e3-ac10-0800200c9a66".

      Constructor and Description
      SSDP() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addHandler(SSDPPackageReceivedInterface handler)
      Adds a handler to the set of handlers that process received packages.
      static void listenToMulticastResponses()
      Listens to messages sent via the multicast address.
      static void listenToMulticastResponsesAsync()
      Starts a new Thread that listens to messages sent via the multicast address.
      static void listenToUnicastResponses()
      Listens to messages sent via the uniicast address.
      static void listenToUnicastResponsesAsync()
      Starts a new Thread that listens to messages sent via the unicast address.
      static void removeHandler(SSDPPackageReceivedInterface handler)
      Removes a handler from the set of handlers that process received packages (if it is in it).
      static void sendDiscoveryMessage()
      Sends the DISCOVER_MESSAGE_ROOTDEVICE to the multicast address in order to find all other UPnP capable devices.
      static void sendDiscoveryMessageAsync(int delayInMilliSeconds)
      Sends the DISCOVER_MESSAGE_ROOTDEVICE asynchronically in order to find all other UPnP capable devices.

      • SSDP

        public SSDP()

    • Method Detail

      • addHandler

        public static void addHandler(SSDPPackageReceivedInterface handler)
        Adds a handler to the set of handlers that process received packages. If the handler is already in the set, it is not added.
        Parameters:
        handler - The SSDPPackageReceivedInterface to add.

      • removeHandler

        public static void removeHandler(SSDPPackageReceivedInterface handler)
        Removes a handler from the set of handlers that process received packages (if it is in it).
        Parameters:
        handler - The SSDPPackageReceivedInterface to remove.

      • sendDiscoveryMessage

        public static void sendDiscoveryMessage()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Sends the DISCOVER_MESSAGE_ROOTDEVICE to the multicast address in order to find all other UPnP capable devices.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendDiscoveryMessageAsync

        public static void sendDiscoveryMessageAsync(int delayInMilliSeconds)
        Sends the DISCOVER_MESSAGE_ROOTDEVICE asynchronically in order to find all other UPnP capable devices.
        Parameters:
        delayInMilliSeconds - Milliseconds to wait before sending the discovery message.

      • listenToMulticastResponses

        public static void listenToMulticastResponses()
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Listens to messages sent via the multicast address. Received messages are parsed and sent to all handlers.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • listenToMulticastResponsesAsync

        public static void listenToMulticastResponsesAsync()
        Starts a new Thread that listens to messages sent via the multicast address. Received messages are parsed and sent to all handlers.

      • listenToUnicastResponses

        public static void listenToUnicastResponses()
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Listens to messages sent via the uniicast address. Received messages are parsed and sent to all handlers.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • listenToUnicastResponsesAsync

        public static void listenToUnicastResponsesAsync()
        Starts a new Thread that listens to messages sent via the unicast address. Received messages are parsed and sent to all handlers.
